name: DARK RAMPAGE
description:
DARK RAMPAGE is an action game where you play as a hero who finds himself in a dark and dangerous world after he falls into a dark well. You have to explore various locations, fight monsters and solve puzzles to find a way out of this gloomy world. You will gain unique abilities and be able to use them in battles with enemies.

Each level will be a test for you, where you will have to show all your skills and strategic thinking. Will you be able to find a way out of this dark world and return?

The game is a 2D platformer with action elements. You need to complete the goal set for the location and destroy all the monsters in order to move further through the location.
